metadata.name: Desolation
metadata.description:
Desolation is a photo collage based on a poem by Alireza Roshan, a famous Persian writer and poet. Here is the verse this artwork is inspired by in Farsi:

فصل عوض می‌شود
جای آلو را 
خرمالو می‌گیرد
جای دلتنگی را
دلتنگی

and here is a free translation in English:

Seasons are changing one after another
persimmons replace plums
[but]  nothing replaces nostalgia

About video: 

• 6 Sec loop
 • Format: MP4 
• Resolution: 1920 X 1920 px
